title: Player Appeals a Ban
description: A player who was banned for toxic behavior submits an appeal, claiming they have reformed.

tasks.description: Retrieve the player's account details, the original ban reason, and their chat logs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accesses all historical data related to the ban.

tasks.description: Review the player's appeal and their past behavior.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the case and notes the player has had multiple previous suspensions.

tasks.description: Based on the history of repeat offenses, deny the appeal and uphold the ban.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent denies the appeal and sends a notification to the player explaining the decision.
